description: A Beatrice user, and a genius who entered into a university at the age of twelve. She was an orphan until the Rudiger family acknowledged her potential. She now aims to be strong enough to support her older brother, Johan, whom she has the utmost respect for. Emelenzia also admires Ayako since she was able to stand toe-to-toe with her brother in battle. She has a crush on Mamoru and tries to seduce him after she transfers.
name: Emelenzia Beatrix Rudiger
